title: Olaitan Elihou Adje
text:
Scientific articles, books, book chapters, and reports published or co-authored are listed below:


Adjé, Elihou, and Mouftaou Amadou Sanni. 2017. “Le Décrochage Scolaire Au Primaire Chez Les Déscolarisés de 12-17 Ans à Tchaourou : Niveau, Variations Et Profils.” In Tchaourou, Une Commune Béninoise : Enquêtes Sur La Population, Les Activités Économiques, La Scolarisation Et La Santé de La Reproduction, 119–37. Canada: Éditions science et bien commun. https://scienceetbiencommun.pressbooks.pub/tchaourou/chapter/le-decrochage-scolaire-au-primaire-chez-les-descolarises-de-12-17-ans-a-tchaourou-niveau-variations-et-profils/.


Adjé, Elihou, Mouftaou Amadou Sanni, and Djima Baranon. 2018. “Formes de Scolarisation Et Caractéristiques Familiales Des Enfants Au Bénin.” Revue DELLA Afrique 1 (2): 375–90.


Amadou Sanni, Mouftaou, and Elihou Adjé. 2019. Bilan Et Profils Des Abandons Scolaires Au Primaire Au Bénin: Les Évidences d’une Enquête En Milieu Scolaire En 2016 Chez Les 12-17 Ans Dans l’arrondissement de Tchaourou. Sarrebuck, Allemagne: Éditions universitaires européennes.


Mintogbe, Mahouli Mireille-Marie, Victorien Tamégnon Dougnon, Elihou Adjé, Ahoussinou Clément, Pierre Gandji, and Mouftaou Amadou Sanni. 2022. “Exposition Aux Média Et Réseaux Sociaux : Influence Sur Les Comportements Sexuels à Risque Chez Les Adolescents Au Bénin” 4 (1): 236–53. https://revues.acaref.net/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2022/11/Mahouli-Mireille-Marie-MINTOGBE1.pdf.


Mintogbe, Mahouli Mireille-Marie, Mouftaou Amadou Sanni, Nelly Harmonie Bigbé Baké Ahoussinou, Odile Sodolouffo, Elihou Adjé, and Djima Barano. 2019. “Unequal Access to HIV Prevention Services by Gender in Benin.” Open Journal of Social Sciences 7 (6): 51–65. https://doi.org/10.4236/jss.2019.76004.

title: ODeSPoL data processing
text: ODeSPoL is a program to observe the state and dynamics of the school population in the department of Borgou (North Bénin) since May 2017. It is an annual data collection operation in all primary schools in all school districts in the communes of the department of Borgou, with a complementary component of observing cases of pregnancy in the school environment, in particular in secondary schools and colleges of all types.

title: Olaitan Elihou Adje
About
text: I am a passionate data analyst with a strong foundation in applied statistics and a growing career in quantitative data analysis. Currently pursuing a doctoral thesis in Demography, I have over five years of experience in research methods across Central and West Africa, where I excel in designing data collection tools and analyzing data using R and Stata. I am dedicated to turning complex data into compelling stories and continually strive to enhance my skills in data visualization and statistical learning.

title: Analysis of GAPMINDER Data
text: This was a project using GAPMINDER data. You can find the project here

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
Welcome to Elihou’s Data Analysis Portfolio

Hello! I’m Olaitan Elihou, a dedicated data analyst with a passion for transforming complex datasets into meaningful insights.
This blog serves as a portfolio showcasing my data analysis projects, scientific publications, and professional journey. Whether you’re interested in my methodologies, outcomes, or academic contributions, you’ll find valuable resources and insights here.
What You’ll Find Here:

Data Analysis Projects: Explore my work in analyzing diverse datasets and the methodologies employed.
Publications: Access my scientific publications that highlight my research contributions.
CV: View my professional background and experience to understand my journey in the field.

Feel free to browse my projects and publications. I welcome collaborations and discussions, so don’t hesitate to reach out!
Thank you for visiting my blog! I hope you find the information helpful and inspiring.
